Class OuterSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • OuterSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class OuterSpace
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable
    The class that runs the other classes to let them interact and create the game. User input is taken and interpreted.
    Author:
    tua3122
    See Also:
